name: Chartlab
tag_list: forex, fx, technical-analysis, tools, accuracy, cross-platform
overview:
Chartlab is a service (SaaS) for forex traders.

It is a set of technical analysis tools based on a new and fresh approach to data analysis and was created as a result of over 15 years of successful trading. The indicators are accurate, therefore this platform can serve as a base for many effective trading strategies.

Thanks to SaaS approach Chartlab can utilize a number of high-efficiency CPUs in order to compute the results and share them with all the users simultaneously. Of course, all the data are delivered to the customers in real-time.

The service is cross-platform. This means it can be used by the customers on any device and whether they are in the office, at home or on the move with just their mobile device with them.
